title: Best car manufacturers based on build quality in Great Britain ( UK ) 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage score for 15 number of Automobile Manufacturerss.
The Percentage score is highest at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and lowest at Automobile Manufacturers Toyota.
The highest Automobile Manufacturers Lexus has 5.42 more Percentage score than the lowest Automobile Manufacturers Toyota.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Automobile Manufacturers in the x axis and Percentage score in the y axis.
The maximum Percentage score 94.27 is found at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and the minimum is found at Toyota where Percentage score is 88.85.
